file.name: path-item-object-parameters-multiple.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Parameter Components
paths:
  /1:
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/skipParam'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/limitParam'
    get:
      summary: List all pets
      responses:
        '204':
          description: no content
  /2:
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/skipParam'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/limitParam'
    get:
      summary: retrieve
      responses:
        '204':
          description: no content
components:
  parameters:
    skipParam:
      name: skip
      in: query
      description: number of items to skip
      required: true
    limitParam:
      name: limit
      in: query
      description: max records to return
      required: true

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: parameters: "skipParam": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
